SamPy.image.transformÂ¶

Image transformation functions.

requires:NumPy
requires:SciPy.ndimage
author:Sami-Matias Niemi
contact:sniemi@unc.edu
version:0.1

Functions

Image(input, tform[, output_range]) Transform the input image using a 3x3 transform.
homogeneous(xywIn) Converts a 2xN or 3xN set of points to homogeneous coordinates.
makeCenteredRotation(angle[, center]) Creates a 3x3 transform matrix for centered rotation.
